story_parts.text: The girl went to Disney with her family. They stayed in a hotel and went to the parks. The girl loved seeing the characters and riding the rides. She had a great time with her family.

next_options.0: The family goes home and the girl is happy to have made so many memories
next_options.1: The family decides to stay an extra day and go to Universal Studios

story_parts.text:
I remember 2nd grade very well. It was the year that I finally began to understand multiplication and division. I was so proud of myself when I could solve problems like 8x7 in my head. My teacher was always impressed with my math skills and would often ask me to help my classmates when they were struggling. I was happy to help, but I also loved showing off my abilities.

In reading and writing, I was also ahead of my classmates. I loved to read

next_options.0: The girl continues to help her classmates, even when she doesn't want to
next_options.1: The girl starts showing off her abilities to her classmates
